entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ambiguity Between IView.Arrange() and VisualElement.Arrange() #17417
  • CarouselView does not work at all #17416
  • Error while setting up the Android emulator from Android Device Manager in Visual Studio #17415
  • Default styling for controls does not work! #17414
  • .NET 8 RC1 Unable to set Button TextColor #17413
    .NET 8 GA
  • Incorrect Labels Margin in Grid when the Margin is Small #17408
  • iOS app crashes on startup after distributing through TestFlight #17405
  • .NET 8 : Windows CollectionView is displayed as Grid Layout even if it should be List if initially the collectionView is not visible #17400
    .NET 8 GA
  • NuGet Automatic Package Restore fails when targeting .net7.0 and platformspecific propertys in csproj #17398
  • [.NET8] MAUI crashing on CarouselView render/remove, flyout menu #17396
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI]All options are only visible when you click them for the first time. #17395
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [VSCode][MAUI]The App hang after pulling down the RefreshView C2 page on iOS and My Mac target. #17394
  • [VSCode][MAUI]The Refresh spinner arrow is not displayed centered on iOS target. #17392
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [MAUI] The App crashes after pulling up and then pulling down the RefreshView C6 page #17391
    .NET 8 GA
  • Shell: Page bottom padding not calculated properly while opening a non-tabbed page from a tabbed page and coming back to the tabbed page #17390
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Setting InputTransparent=true on a layout will remove the background #17389

Closed

  • Cannot Build MAUI Blazor Android App when Referencing a Blazor WebAssembly Project #16782
  • ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method is not working correctly #15110
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui Hybrid App stuck on "Loading..." in release mode on Android #17130
  • Label and ImageButton in Grid - Clicked doesn't fire on Android or iOS, works fine in Windows #17384
  • Image AspectFill not working #6378
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.2.7871] AppThemeBinding in VisualState prevents from updating Button.Background #16960
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] XAMLC is currently throwing exceptions in RC1 that don't appear to have been throwing in PReview7 #17333
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] invalid GradientBrush color causes crash #15667
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport uitests #17420
  • Merge main into net8.0 #17419
  • Cleanup SwipeView and Propagate BC until we can fix compat layout #17418
  • Merge net8.0 into main #17412
  • Add .editorconfig to Core for specifying CA rules #17411
  • Remove code from swipe view that kept recreating and re-assigning SwipeItems #17410
    .NET 8 GA
  • Enable .NET 7 <MauiVersion> to work in .NET 8 SDK projects #17409
    .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Bump stable versions on main #17407
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [tizen]Bump Tizen to rc2 packages #17399
  • passing test for #16960 #17397
  • [X] fix CollectionItems enumeration #17364
    .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17388
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #17345
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #17267
    .NET 8 GA
  • Increase timeouts to 4 hours #17386

Updated

  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048
    area/architecture, Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Build the previous TFM for Essentials & Graphics #17042
    Under Consideration
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Remove Previous TitleView from Toolbar #17353
    .NET 8 GA
  • Split out sharable testing for non-element thing #17387
